description: Put down a token in the geometrical center of the following world. You are guaranteed that the width and height of the world will be odd numbers.
pre:
think(0)
import random

width = 2
height = 2
while width % 2 == 0:
    width = random.randint(3, 15)
while height % 2 == 0:
    height = random.randint(3, 15)

RUR.set_world_size(width, height)
RUR.fill_background("grass")
RUR.give_object_to_robot("token",99)

#Find Target Location
target_x = (width//2)+1
target_y = (height//2)+1


options = {'goal' : True}
RUR.add_object("token", target_x, target_y, options)
